org.apache.flink.api.java.record.operators

Class FileDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.Operator<OUT>
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.base.GenericDataSourceBase<OUT,FileInputFormat<OUT>>
        • org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.base.FileDataSourceBase<Record>
          • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.operators.FileDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitable<Operator<?>>

    public class FileDataSource
extends FileDataSourceBase<Record>
    Operator for input nodes which read data from files. (For Record data model)

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileDataSource

        public FileDataSource(FileInputFormat<Record> f,
                      String filePath,
                      String name)
        Creates a new instance for the given file using the given file input format.
        Parameters:
        f - The FileInputFormat implementation used to read the data.
        filePath - The file location. The file path must be a fully qualified URI, including the address schema.
        name - The given name for the Pact, used in plans, logs and progress messages.

      • FileDataSource

        public FileDataSource(FileInputFormat<Record> f,
                      String filePath)
        Creates a new instance for the given file using the given input format. The contract has the default name.
        Parameters:
        f - The FileInputFormat implementation used to read the data.
        filePath - The file location. The file path must be a fully qualified URI, including the address schema.

      • FileDataSource

        public FileDataSource(Class<? extends FileInputFormat<Record>> f,
                      String filePath,
                      String name)
        Creates a new instance for the given file using the given file input format.
        Parameters:
        f - The FileInputFormat implementation used to read the data.
        filePath - The file location. The file path must be a fully qualified URI, including the address schema.
        name - The given name for the Pact, used in plans, logs and progress messages.

      • FileDataSource

        public FileDataSource(Class<? extends FileInputFormat<Record>> f,
                      String filePath)
        Creates a new instance for the given file using the given input format. The contract has the default name.
        Parameters:
        f - The FileInputFormat implementation used to read the data.
        filePath - The file location. The file path must be a fully qualified URI, including the address schema.
